summary.purpose: Provides basic math utility functions for use across client applications.
summary.problem_solved: Centralizes common arithmetic operations to avoid duplication and ensure consistent behavior across the codebase.

exports.name: multiply
exports.description_one_line: Multiplies two numbers and returns the product.

symbols.name: multiply
symbols.description_one_line: Multiplies two numbers and returns the product.

returns.description: The arithmetic product of a and b.

details.what_it_does: Returns the arithmetic product of two numeric values (a * b). A pure function with no side effects.

minimal_correct.title: Basic multiplication
minimal_correct.code:
import { multiply } from 'akeyless-client-commons';

const result = multiply(3, 4); // 12

extensive_correct.title: Multiply with negative and decimal numbers
extensive_correct.code:
import { multiply } from 'akeyless-client-commons';

const product1 = multiply(6, 7);    // 42
const product2 = multiply(-3, 5);   // -15
const product3 = multiply(2.5, 4);  // 10
const product4 = multiply(0, 100);  // 0
